statements: UPDATE variant_data SET variant_name='Variant1', allele_freq=0.2 WHERE variant_id=1;

UPDATE variant_data SET gene_name = 'ABCD', chromosome = 'X', variant_name = 'Variant XYZ' WHERE allele_freq > 0.5
UPDATE Variants SET variant_name='Variant1', position=100, chromosome_number=2 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE Diseases SET disease_name='DiseaseX', severity_level='High', associated_genes='GeneA, GeneB' WHERE id=3;

UPDATE variants SET gene_name = 'BRCA1', variant_type = 'Missense', allele_freq = 0.05 WHERE variant_id = 1;

UPDATE variants SET allele_freq = 0.05 WHERE variant_id = 1
UPDATE patients SET age = 30, gender = 'Female' WHERE patient_id = 2
